ProjectTitle: Optical binding of nanoparticles outside the photon beam: the creation of primeval optical matter
InitialFeedbackHistory:
15/01/2024
Storage: please note that using hard drives for data storage gives a high risk of data loss; and that the costs that you mention are much higher than expected for the data volume described in the table. Have a look at the storage guide for more information and recommended storage solutions: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
Preservation: please note that the KU Leuven policy asks for preservation of all relevant data for 10 years, see https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/policy
Sharing:  Lirias is not a suitable repository for data sharing, you can use RDR to make your data available for reuse: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/rdr
label: good with suggestions
